author: fitz
msg: The book is no longer a draft.

author: ghudson
msg: Create repository DB directories with the sgid bit set on Unix, so
that setting up a multi-uid-access repository is simpler and less
on the db directory after creating it.  (Trying to set the bit at
mkdir time doesn't seem to work, oddly.)

author: kfogel
msg: * COMMITTERS: Add Øyvind Møll for Norwegian Bokmål.

author: josander
msg: Fixed some typos and made some rewrites to the Norwegian Bokmål messages.
Patch from Øyvind A. Holm after a discussion on IRC between
Øyvind Møll, Øyvind A. Holm and me.
- Added ", fuzzy" for some untranslated messages
- "Navn for nytt innslag påkrevd ved import av en fil" changed to
"Nytt tilgangsnavn påkrevd ved import av en fil"

author: brane
msg: Improve option handling  in the test scripts.
the getopt module to parse options, in order to support both
